meaningMnemonic: <kanji>God</kanji> (<kanji>formal name ender</kanji>) is <vocabulary>God</vocabulary>! Or the <vocabulary>gods</vocabulary>, if you're talking to more than one. You have to be polite to them, so you add that ender on there.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned them both already so you should be able to read this too!
